::Stratus::

Stratus nods. "Allright."

He runs after Condor, two appendages emerging from his shoulders. 
After taking a second to check whether the bot was one of his group, 
Stratus fires. Two glob launch from the appendages, speeding 
extremely fast toward Condor. The globs were flipping randomly 
through the air as they flew to make them hard to hit.

If one of the globs would hit, it would spread an extremely strong 
organix substance around its victim, trapping it untill released by 
Stratus.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster looks at the new robot, then hears the voice in his 
head. "Okay
> rookie, your up," he points towards Condor, "hit him, and your in 
the
> group, just dont kill him". Motormaster takes off of the ground, 
and starts
> to fly towards Condor, letting his Cyclone cannon blast once 
towards Condor.
